title: fix: use NEWS label on README news PRs for correct project routing
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Sorting the mail
gist.blurb: Fixed the labeling logic for daily news updates so they land on the right desk.
gist.summary: Updated the automated news workflow to apply the correct `NEWS` label for proper project board routing.
gist.impact: Automated PRs will now bypass AI classification and go straight to the News project.
gist.visual_concept: A robot sorting letters into slots. Since it's discord_only, the image prompt is less critical but still required by the schema.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art of a cute robot sorting envelopes into labeled slots on a wooden shelf. The bee mascot watches helpfully. Lime green (#ecf874) accents. Warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic.
